headline: Jim Cramer Says Micron Stock’s Pullback Presents a Gradual Buying Opportunity
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the 13 stocks recently discussed by Jim Cramer. A caller asked if Cramer thinks the company is in a better position to dominate AI over the next 5-10 years. He replied: “I can’t tell you how glad I am that you brought up Micron.
